10044.quoteText: Using it for spamming or illegal purposes is forbidden and any such use will result in the TinyURL being disabled and you may be reported to all ISPs involved and to the proper governmental agencies.
10044.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

tosdr.case: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

10962.quoteText: We may share aggregated information, Non-Identifying Information and Log Data with third parties for industry analysis and demographic profiling and to deliver targeted advertising about other products and services.
10962.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

10963.quoteText: We will disclose any information about you to government or law enforcement officials or private parties as we, in our sole discretion, believe necessary or appropriate to respond to claims and legal process (including but not limited to subpoenas), to protect the property and rights of TinyURL or a third party, to protect the safety of the public or any person, or to prevent or stop any illegal, unethical or legally actionable activity.
10963.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

tosdr.case: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

10964.quoteText: TinyURL may sell, transfer or otherwise share some or all of its assets in connection with a merger, acquisition, reorganization or sale of assets or in the event of bankruptcy.
10964.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

10965.quoteText: The Services are not directed to children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13.
10965.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

10966.quoteText: You can learn more about the use of cookies and how you can opt out of the marketing programs of third party advertisers in connection with their use of cookies and similar technologies, by visiting http://www.networkadvertising.org
10966.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

10967.quoteText: If you don't accept cookies, however, you may not be able to use all portions of the Site or all functionality of the Services.
10967.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

10968.quoteText: From time to time we may update this Privacy Policy. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on the Site.
10968.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

10969.quoteText: We use this information to monitor and analyze use of the Services and for the Site's technical administration, to increase our Site's functionality and user-friendliness, and to better tailor it to our visitors' needs.
10969.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

tosdr.case: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

10970.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

12176.quoteText:
TinyURL and third party advertisers on the Site may also place or read cookies on your browser.
These cookies may collect information that can be used to tailor advertising to you on TinyURL, other websites and other forms of media.
12176.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.
